yaml_import.title: Not supported
yaml_import.description: Devices configured using `YAML` cannot be configured in the UI. Delete your device from `YAML` and re-create it in the UI or modify your `YAML` configuration.

add_device.title: Choose device to configure
add_device.description: Compatible Tuya devices on your local network are discovered automatically once they have been set-up in the Tuya app. If you can't see the device you expected, choose `Add device manually` from the dropdown.

edit_device.title: Reconfigure existing device
edit_device.description: Select the device you wish to re-configure.

configure_cloud.description: Configure the credentials used to connect to the Tuya Cloud API.

configure_device.title: Configure device connectivity
configure_device.description: Configure any device details{for_device} that are empty (if any) to allow LocalTuya to connect to the device.

data.enable_debug: Enable debug (must be manually enabled in `configuration.yaml` too)
data.scan_interval: (Optional) Scan interval in seconds, if not scanning automatically
data.manual_dps_strings: (Optional) Manual DPS's, if not detected automatically (separated by commas)
data.reset_dpids: (Optional) DPIDs to send in RESET command, if device does not respond to status requests after turning on (separated by commas)

device_setup_method.title: Configure device entities
device_setup_method.description: LocalTuya will try to discover the rest of the configuration automatically. However, if this does not work for your device or you would like to tweak settings, choose the `manual` option.

auto_configure_device.title: Auto configure
auto_configure_device.description: An error occurred: {err_msg}. If reason isn't showing, check logs.

pick_entity_type.title: Entity type selection
pick_entity_type.description: Choose the type of entity you want to add.

choose_template.title: Import template file
choose_template.description: Template files are located in the `templates` directory.

data_description.templates:
You can enter the file name manually if it didn't shows up.
Templates can be found and shared with others on GitHub ([More Info](https://github.com/xZetsubou/hass-localtuya/discussions/13)).

configure_entity.title: Configure entity
configure_entity.description: Please fill out the details for {entity} with type {platform}. All settings (except for `Type` and `ID`) can be changed from the `Configure` page later.

data.span_time: Full opening time, in secs. (for *timed* mode only)
data.scene_values: Scene values, separate entries by comma ','
data.scene_values_friendly: User friendly scene values, separate entries by comma ','
data.select_options: Valid entries, separate entries by comma ','
data.select_options_friendly: User Friendly options, separate entries by comma ','
data.fan_speed_ordered_list: Fan speed modes list (overrides speed min/max)
data.restore_on_reconnect: Restore the last value set in Home Assistant after lost connection?
data.is_passive_entity: Passive entity? (requires integration to send initialisation value)
data.entity_category: Show the entity in this category
